questions.text:
What is the output of the following code?

console.log(2 + '2');
Which of the following is NOT a valid JavaScript variable name?
What is the correct way to check if a variable is of type 'function'?
What is the purpose of the 'use strict' directive in JavaScript?
choices: To enable strict mode for the entire application
To specify that the code should be executed in strict mode
To allow the use of modern JavaScript features
To force the code to run faster
questions.correctAnswer: To specify that the code should be executed in strict mode

questions.text: Which array method is used to add one or more elements to the end of an array and returns the new length of the array?
